[Page Title: High Cotton - Private Events]

Private Events

Our private event rooms offer a unique blend of historic charm and sophisticated elegance. Reclaimed wood floors and exposed brick walls create a warm, inviting atmosphere, while palm leaf fans add a touch of old-world appeal. Our dedicated team is committed to delivering superior service and meticulous attention to detail, ensuring your event is unforgettable. Savor the freshest local catches prepared by our culinary experts, as you and your guests create lasting memories.

Please inquire for room fee and food beverage minimum

Let Keith Neighbours tell you more at or
(843) 724-3815 Call us at 843 724 3815 kneighbours@hallmanagementgroup.com Write us at kneighbours@hallmanagementgroup.com TAKE A LOOK AROUND WITH OUR VIRTUAL TOUR PRIVATE DINING MENUS INQUIRE NOW about event reservation 
MAIN DINING ROOM

Exposed brick, heart pine floors, abundant natural light and views of East Bay Street make the Main Dining Room a casually elegant, purely Charleston space for inspired, one-of-a-kind events.

Up to 100 seated, 150 reception
Capacity: 
FRENCH QUARTER ROOM

With heart pine floors, beautiful crown, molding, and French doors that open to a patio for al fresco entertaining, the French Quarter room warmly welcomes an array of special events.

Up to 60 seated, 80 reception
Capacity: 
EAST BAY ROOM

Featuring prime views of the street for which it's named, the East Bay Room boasts fabric-covered walls, sparkling chandeliers, and an ornate fireplace creating a sophisticated, intimate space for brides, business, and partygoers.

Up to 30 seated, 40 reception
Capacity: PRIVATE DINING MENUS TAKE A LOOK AROUND With our virtual tour INQUIRE NOW about event reservation

[Page Title: Best American Restaurant in Charleston, SC | High Cotton]

Lowcountry Living 
From conversation and laughter in our bar to our stylish dining rooms of heart pine floors and antique brick, you’ll come to understand true Charleston hospitality. That is, there’s always cause for celebration – of our neighbors, our food and drink and each other. It’s our great pleasure to share it with you.
Read more about us Groups & Private Events 
We welcome every type of private event

We look forward to making your event memorable, designed with you in mind.
View Our Rooms a private party Our Menus 
Dedicated To QUALITY

Finest Local Ingredients & Freshest Seafood

Reservations
Book your High Cotton reservation on Resy Skip Photo Gallery 
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

KB R:
five star review by 
Absolutely amazing restaurant. Food was fresh and excellent . Service was A+ . Highly recommend for seafood . Very nice ambiance. Also nice bar area

Review by - Google

Tony G:
five star review by 
We loved Brunch at High Cotton. It is a Halls restaurant with great service and a good comfort menu. The burger and the filet Mignon where each excellent. High Cotton is classic and classy.

Review by - Google

Golden E:
five star review by 
Did not disappoint. That hot skillet cinnamon roll was like manna from heaven. Reservations are must, even for brunch.

Review by - Google

Evan D:
five star review by 
The sweet potatoe cheesecake was delicious and the side of brussel sprouts was amazing. We thought the crab cakes were good but not great. Loved the live music.

Review by - Google

Hannah K:
five star review by 
The absolute best meal my fiancé and I have ever had. We've been to several higher end restaurants and we always go back to, "this was good but do you remember high cotton?" Nothing compares.
Reset zoom 
Location

199 East Bay Street

Charleston, SC

29401

Hours

DINNER

Monday - Thursday 4:30pm - 10pm

Friday 4:30pm - 11pm

Saturday 4:30pm - 11pm

Sunday 4:30pm - 10pm

BRUNCH

Saturday - Sunday 10am - 2pm

BAR

Opens at 4:00pm daily

+ SPECIAL HOURS +

Thanksgiving 12:00noon - 8:00pm

Friday, Nov. 28 2:00pm - 11:00pm

Christmas Eve 4:00pm - 10:00pm

Christmas Day closed

New Year's Eve 4:00pm - 1:00am

New Year's Day 4:30pm - 10:00pm
